experience.company: University of Washington - Paul G. Allen School of Computer Science
experience.description: Conducted research on the efficiency of distributed systems and consensus algorithms. Developed a simulation framework in Python to benchmark network latency across various node configurations, contributing to a published paper on scalable backend architectures.

Implemented research-based optimization techniques for large-scale data processing pipelines. Assisted in the development of a prototype software suite that utilized experimental caching strategies to reduce CPU overhead by 12%.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
